results.title: The role of beta blockers in alcohol withdrawal syndrome.
results.text_hl: On each treatment day, significantly fewer @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ required concomitant @CHEMICAL_Oxazepam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010076 @@@oxazepam@@@ therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Psychomotor_Agitation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011595 @@@agitation@@@.

results.title: Central nervous system effects of beta-adrenergic-blocking drugs: the role of ancillary properties.
results.text_hl: Subjective reports of sleep similarly indicated increased wakefulness and greater @<m>DISEASE_Psychomotor_Agitation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011595 @@@restlessness@@@ with lipophilic beta-blockers.
